original_text: They used a string of blue material to tie the rings of the breastpiece to the rings of the ephod. They fixed them together above the ephod's belt, so that the breastpiece would not become separate. The workers made all these things as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 청색 끈으로 흉패 고리와 에봇 고리에 꿰어 흉패로 정교하게 짠 에봇 띠 위에 붙여서 에봇에서 벗어지지 않게 하였으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 하였더라

sentences.original_text: They used a string of blue material
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 푸른 재질로 된 끈을 사용했으며

sentences.original_text: to tie the rings of the breastpiece
to the rings of the ephod
so that the breastpiece would not become separate
The workers made all these things
as the Lord had commanded Moses
